query: Can I spra yinsecticide at home for dengue?
expected_prefix: Household insecticide sprays can reduce adult mosquitoes temporarily but are not a long-term solution. Focus on eliminating breeding sites and follow community vector control guidance for sustained im
reply: Dengue is not spread person-to-person, so strict isolation is not required. However, avoid being available for mosquitoes to bite (use repellents, screens) to reduce local transmission and protect others. (variant 3534)

query: How will I now if I have dengue?
expected_prefix: Early symptoms commonly appear 4â€“7 days after an infected mosquito bite and include sudden high fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, muscle and joint pain, and sometimes a skin rash. Symptoms
reply: There is no specific antiviral for most dengue infections. Treatment is supportive: rest, maintain fluids, and use paracetamol (acetaminophen) for fever and pain. Avoid NSAIDs and aspirin due to bleeding risk. Seek medical advice for severe or worsening symptoms. (variant 1504)
